cast.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.
cast.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

details.biography: Richard El Khazen is a Lebanese-American Actor known for his intense dramatic acting roles. Best known for his role as the Lieutenant in the Emmy-nominated, internationally acclaimed Docudrama, the Sultan and the Saint (2016), and Interpol Investigates (2004). He worked on several film and television projects to include industrial, documentary, educational, foreign and independent.
details.name: Richard El Khazen
